short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert to PDF and search the web on each new tab, quick and easy to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDFConverty New Tab is a very easy-to-use web based interface for PDF conversion and searching the web.
Each new tab includes a unique rectangle where you can easily drag and drop your documents and convert them to Pdf. Furthermore, each new tab also includes a search field so you can easily make your daily queries along conversion tasks.
 
Please note this extension will change your New Tab search.
New Tab search results powered by Yahoo.

Some important information for you:
By clicking on the 'Add to Chrome' button and installing PdfConvertyNewTab, you agree to install this extension, with our Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service. 

You can review our Terms of Service at https://pdfconvertynewtab.com/terms.html
You can review our Privacy Policy at https://pdfconvertynewtab.com/privacy.html

You can decide to remove or disable this extension anytime.
